Text:
just found your uploads, love them!

how often is a new adventure time released?

THANKS! :)

sabiisrad, 2 adventure time comics come out per month. this #13 is from the ongoing series and also they've done a 6-issue miniseries "marceline and the scream queens" and now they are releasing "fionna and cake" -- #2 just came out. so there are 21 comics out so far.
I had to recover my account to post this; Thank you so much! This is amazing!
Did you scan this yourself? If so, great job at getting it to include the green subscripts.  It allowed me to read that totally mathematical Ice King - Polar Coordinates joke.
Tetranitrate, no the scanner is Bean from the Empire group. i just find these on other sites and upload to TPB to contribute. i'm sure Bean would be happy to hear you like it, though.
